DOC.brief_summary: Hypothesis: Quality Improvement tools like "Heart Failure Discharge Checklist" which emphasizes on proper education to patients, ensure appropriate dose titration and counselling improve outcome in congestive heart failure (CHF).
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Quality Improvement Tools in Congestive Heart Failure (CHF)
DOC.criteria: Patients admitted to SJMO with principal diagnosis of acute decompensated heart failure Age less than 18 years Pregnant women
